Name: Elven Love
About the game: Elven Love will let you feel ancient magic on your skin! Immerse into mystical and mysterious worlds of Wood and Moon Elves. Despite shared ancestors, both races are different in many ways and falling in love between them is very unusual. For those rare occasions, they have an ancient ritual of love which must to be done for the reunion of both kin. In this experience, you will be witnessing ceremony preparations of two elves, connected by the spiritual bond of love. Features: Use magical wands to pose the elves, move them and do other interesting activities High-quality elves models with custom skin solution Two unique races with individual culture, surroundings etc. Unique mystical, fantasy atmosphere Immerse yourself into this experience by completing different puzzles Watch elves dance with a passion for you
